actions.args: {"id": 88, "body": {"name": "Travel Stipend [REDACTED] IRL", "summary": "Hey folks! I\\\\\\'m a dev from Germany and advisor of the Student initiative AachenBlockchainClub my first NEARCON IRL Hackathon in Lisbon with party.ngo. Now I\\\\\\'m with Growthmate.xyz, using AI to help user growth in the NEAR ecosystem. My recent Ethereum hacks have been all about account abstraction and building dapps my mom would love. I\\\\\\'m hyped to bring that energy in person! Looking for a stipend to cover my flights. I will be submitting my own project.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "kyc_verified": false, "timeline_version": "V1", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "# Hackathon Project\\\\nI will hack during the IRL time, foucssing mainly on building by exploring the MetaTransaction and Chain Signatures similar what I did for a side project in the EVM world: [web3era.dev](Web3Era) To further deepdive the Near ecosystem. And get to show people another cool hackathon for my TikTok page. \\\\n\\\\n# Past Hackathons\\\\n**HIGHLIGHT** Lisbon NEARCON IRL Hackathon https://devpost.com/software/partyngo Check out the pitch on Stage: https://youtu.be/Iw8_04Kk1aw?t=15323\\\\n\\\\n*Most recent hacks that have been focussing on Account Abstraction with MetaTransactions*\\\\nETHRome 2024: https://taikai.network/ethrome/hackathons/ethrome-24/projects/cm1wvlvlu003kh12d7mxcj022/idea \\\\n*IExec\\\\\\'s Data Protector SDK did not work out of the box with Privy (Social Login with embeded wallets). While other hackers made it opt-in, I delved into MetaTransactions and got whitelisted on their sidechain to deploy my own Relayer. This involved implementing the first big step of the SDK from the bottom up.Received an extra bounty for this efford with the title: Never Give Up.* \\\\n\\\\nETHGlobal Online 2024: https://ethglobal.com/showcase/verifymydevice-0u1oc\\\\nMutual review driven smartphone certification (proof-of-condition).\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n# Travel Itinerary and Estimated Costs\\\\nDeparture: Colonge, Germany -> Bangkok, Thailand (6-7th November)\\\\nReturn: Bangkok, Thailand -> Colonge, Germany (16th December)\\\\n\\\\nFlights: ~1.300 US Dollar\\\\nRequesting a 1000 USD stipend. \\\\n\\\\nThank you for your consideration!", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "dercio.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon", "Travel expenses"]}

{"id": 91, "body": {"name": "Tobias Leinss Stipend Proposal - Munich - Bangkok", "summary": "Hi, I am Tobias.\\\\n\\\\nI am following near for 2-3 years now. I\\\\\\'ve got to know Vlad of the team at EthPrague who introduced me to the BOS. \\\\n\\\\nAlso, I attended NearCon last year in Lisbon and did the hackathon there where I then used the BOS and submitted a project.\\\\n\\\\nI\\\\\\'ve brought some Lens components to the BOS (see description).\\\\n\\\\nI would be grateful having the opportunity to hack in Bangkok and meet people IRL. Lisbon has been an amazing experience which I am very thankful for.\\\\n\\\\nBest Tobias", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "kyc_verified": false, "timeline_version": "V1", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "NearCon submission from Lisbon\\\\nhttps://devpost.com/software/calimocho-attestation-service\\\\n\\\\nLens components on BOS\\\\nhttps://github.com/Caruso33/bos_lens\\\\n\\\\nthis allowes to search for Lens profiles, see their posts and comments, and (un-)follow them.", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "leinss.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "770", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Hackathon"]}

{"id": 94, "body": {"name": "Travel Stipend Request for Redacted IRL", "summary": "reCEPTION is an API service platform that uses AI to analyze smart contracts in real time and enhance security. Inspired by reCAPTCHA, it verifies the safety of contracts before transactions are processed, supporting secure cryptocurrency payments on e-commerce and Web3 platforms.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "kyc_verified": false, "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "# Introduction\\\\nWe are team of 5 from Global.\\\\n\\\\nI\\\\\\'m Saurabh Kaplas, a smart contract developer with over 1 year of experience!\\\\nAnd the team composition is a Software engineer 2, AI engineer 1 and Smart Contract Developer 1.\\\\n\\\\n[Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/saurabhkaplas)\\\\n[Github](https://github.com/skpkss)\\\\n[Portfolio](https://saurabhkaplas.netlify.app/)\\\\n[Telegram](https://t.me/insane03)\\\\n\\\\n**This proposal is for me(Saurabh Kaplas).**\\\\n\\\\n# Description\\\\nreCeption is a Web3 security project designed to enhance the safety of smart contracts in decentralized ecosystems. Inspired by reCAPTCHA, it provides a security checkpoint for smart contracts by analyzing them for vulnerabilities before transactions are processed. By integrating NEAR AI, reCeption offers real-time contract analysis, helping both Web2 and Web3 platforms, such as e-commerce and decentralized applications, to securely handle cryptocurrency payments and other blockchain interactions.\\\\n\\\\nOur target users include developers, businesses, and everyday users who need a reliable tool to ensure their smart contracts are secure, making blockchain technology more trustworthy and user-friendly.\\\\n\\\\nWe plan to showcase our working MVP during the [REDACTED] hackathon in Bangkok and further develop reCEPTION during the event. We\\\\\\'re on track to submit the online version of the project by October 25th and look forward to continuing work on it during the IRL hackathon.\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n# Purpose\\\\nThe [REDACTED] hackathon is a fantastic opportunity for us to improve reCEPTION and contribute to the NEAR ecosystem. We believe this project has the potential and secure to create Web2 & Web3 value in AI based securify solution. Engaging with the NEAR community during the hackathon will help us learn, gain valuable feedback, and push our project to the next level.\\\\n\\\\n# Request for Travel Stipend\\\\nWe\\\\u{2019}re requesting a travel stipend to help cover our flights and accommodation for the hackathon.\\\\n\\\\nFlight cost per person: $800 (Chandigarh, India \\\\u{2192} Bangkok, Thailand ; round trip)\\\\nAccommodation per person: $200\\\\nMy Request: $1000\\\\n\\\\nI am only requesting assistance for flights and accommodation. We will manage other expenses such as food and local transport ourselves.\\\\n\\\\n# Project Overview:\\\\nreCEPTION is an AI-powered security platform that offers functionality similar to reCAPTCHA, providing automated verification solutions for both Web2 and Web3 environments. The project aims to enhance the security and quality of smart contracts and provide automated validation solutions for users and developers.\\\\n\\\\n# Past Projects\\\\nAdjoining the hackathons link i have participated in the past :\\\\n\\\\nETH Online 2024 : https://ethglobal.com/showcase/eth-various-swusm \\\\nLFGHO 2024 :  https://ethglobal.com/showcase/ghotoevents-gy8os\\\\nETH Online 2023 :  https://ethglobal.com/showcase/tradecode-ddxrp\\\\nSustainable Development Hackathon:  https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Pm0QT2IdAvZu22I_wz6w5TTluzEUrck3/view?usp=sharing\\\\nIBM Technovate : https://drive.google.com/file/d/1DJIp5vnCVf8gFGTX4qAucC1QSkE-8NT1/view?usp=sharing\\\\n\\\\n# Why I Need Support\\\\nAlthough I currently have no income, I am very interested in the Web3 ecosystem, and I really want to participate and contribute to global events. Therefore, if Near Protocol gives us this great opportunity, we will do our best and appreciate the opportunity to directly activate Near Protocol\\\\\\'s good projects in the ecosystem!\\\\n\\\\n# Conclusion\\\\nI would like to attend the [REDACTED] hackathon in Bangkok because I would like to continue developing and presenting reCEPTION in the field NEAR to show off really good security solutions to the web3. Your support means a lot to us and will make our project a reality.\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [87], "receiver_account": "saurabhkaplas.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "1000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": ["Meetup", "Hackathon", "Travel expenses"]}

{"id": 95, "body": {"name": "Travel Stipend Request for [REDACTED] IRL (Bangkok, 2024)", "summary": "My name is Arin Dewangan, a blockchain developer, hackathon enthusiast, and student at Chanakya University, Bengaluru. We are seeking a stipend to attend [REDACTED] in Bangkok, where we will contribute our expertise in decentralized technologies, mentor participating teams, and present a project that bridges AI and Web3. This event represents a remarkable opportunity to demonstrate our work, exchange ideas, and collaborate with the global blockchain community.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "kyc_verified": false, "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "## NEAR Contributions\\\\nWe have been active contributors to the NEAR ecosystem, engaging in open-source projects and decentralized applications that align with NEAR\\\\\\'s vision. Our contributions include participation in the NEAR MetaBUILD III Hackathon and support for various community-driven initiatives.\\\\n\\\\nNEAR MetaBUILD III Hackathon: https://devpost.com/software/nft-e-ar-th-nftd-stablecoin-backed-by-virtual-land\\\\n\\\\n## Hackathon Experience\\\\nOur team has participated in and won several high-profile hackathons, including:\\\\n\\\\n- **IIT HACKS** (Winner, 1st place)  \\\\n- **Hackfusion 1.0**  \\\\n- **FuturistFest 2024 X NASA**  \\\\n- NEAR MetaBUILD III Hackathon: https://devpost.com/software/nft-e-ar-th-nftd-stablecoin-backed-by-virtual-land  \\\\n- Chainlink Fall 2022 Hackathon: https://devpost.com/software/nft-e-ar-th-nftd-stablecoin-backed-by-virtual-land-6fgljs  \\\\n- TRON Grand Hackathon - Season 3: https://devpost.com/software/nft-e-ar-th-nftd-stablecoin-backed-by-virtual-land-2o4kfe  \\\\n- And many others, working on solutions combining blockchain and AI technologies\\\\n\\\\nThese experiences have strengthened our ability to collaborate effectively, deliver innovative solutions, and solve real-world problems through cutting-edge technology.\\\\n\\\\n## Top Projects\\\\nWe have worked on a number of impactful projects, including:\\\\n\\\\n- **NFT E(AR)TH** & **NFTD** (Stablecoin backed by virtual land)  \\\\n- Trax AI (Submitted to IIT Hacks): https://devpost.com/software/trax-ai  \\\\n- Farmfuture AI (Submitted to FuturistFest 2024 X NASA): https://devpost.com/software/farmfuture-crop-suitability-prediction  \\\\n- And many others across blockchain, AI, and sustainability\\\\n\\\\n## Links\\\\n- Devpost: https://devpost.com/arindewangan  \\\\n- GitHub: https://github.com/arindewangan  \\\\n- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/arindewangan\\\\n\\\\n## Team Information\\\\nThis project is a collaboration between **Arin Dewangan** and **Gulshan**, both experienced in blockchain and AI technologies. Together, we have successfully developed and presented innovative solutions at various hackathons and competitions.\\\\n\\\\n## Travel Itinerary and Estimated Costs\\\\nHere is our travel plan for [REDACTED] in Bangkok:\\\\n\\\\n- **Flights (Bengaluru \\\\u{2192} Bangkok):** $300  \\\\n- **Other Travel Expenses (Accommodation, Local Transport, etc.):** $200  \\\\n- **Total Estimated Cost:** $500 (requesting a stipend of $500 to cover full travel and participation costs)\\\\n\\\\n## Project Work\\\\nWe are currently developing an innovative project titled **\\\\\\\"Decentralized AI-Powered Reputation System for Web3.\\\\\\\"** The system will use AI to analyze users\\\\\\' on-chain behavior across multiple blockchains, generating a tamper-proof reputation score that is recorded on-chain. This score would be applicable for DeFi participants, NFT traders, DAO members, and dApp users, increasing trust and accountability in decentralized ecosystems.\\\\n\\\\nKey features include:\\\\n- **AI Evaluation:** Trustworthiness based on transaction history, community contributions, and engagement in Web3 ecosystems.\\\\n- **Decentralized:** Reputation scores will be stored on-chain, ensuring transparency and user control.\\\\n- **Chain-Agnostic:** This system will aggregate user activity across multiple blockchains to create a unified reputation score for all Web3 interactions.\\\\n\\\\nThis project addresses a key challenge in decentralized networks\\\\u{2014}building trust and accountability\\\\u{2014}while providing a scalable solution applicable across DeFi, NFTs, and DAOs.\\\\n\\\\n## Conclusion\\\\nWe are excited about the opportunity to participate in [REDACTED] and contribute our innovative project to the hackathon. The stipend will help cover travel expenses, allowing us to focus fully on developing and refining this solution. Thank you for considering our application.", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "arind.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": ["Hackathon", "Travel expenses"]}

{"body": {"name": "NEAR RWA Tokenized Vault powered by Unblock Technolabs Travel Stipend", "summary": "I am applying for a travel and accommodation stipend to attend the Redacted Hackathon in Bangkok, where I will represent Unblock Technolabs and showcase my project, the NEAR RWA Tokenized Vault. This project aims to tokenize real-world assets using the NEAR Protocol, demonstrating both technical expertise and innovative use cases.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "yarotska.near", "description": "**Applicant Information:**\\\\nNames: Dhavalkumar Davra\\\\nCompany: Unblock Technolabs\\\\nEvent: Redacted Hackathon, Bangkok\\\\nProject: NEAR RWA Tokenized Vault\\\\n\\\\n**About Me:**\\\\nI am a co-founder of Unblock Technolabs, a web3 development company recognized as one of the t[op 10 web3 startups in India in 2023 ](https://startup.siliconindia.com/vendor/unblock-technolabs-bringing-the-power-of-blockchain-to-your-fingertips-cid-19731.html) by Silicon India Magazine. Our company has successfully served over 50 clients, primarily in the Ethereum ecosystem. With growing client demand for NEAR Protocol solutions, I am committed to expanding our services into the NEAR ecosystem. Attending this hackathon will allow me to further our knowledge, build strong connections within the NEAR community, and showcase our skills.\\\\n\\\\n**Near RWA Tokenized Vault:**\\\\nThe NEAR RWA Tokenized Vault is a decentralized vault built on the NEAR Protocol that allows users to tokenize real-world assets (RWAs) such as real estate, commodities, or other physical assets. The vault enables users to pool funds and invest in these tokenized assets, with the underlying asset values determining the pool\\\\u{2019}s overall value. Investors in the vault will earn returns based on the appreciation of the tokenized assets, providing a seamless way for decentralized finance (DeFi) participants to invest in real-world assets through blockchain technology. This project not only demonstrates the scalability of the NEAR Protocol but also bridges the gap between traditional finance and decentralized finance by leveraging tokenization.\\\\n\\\\n**Event Goals:**\\\\n> Present the NEAR RWA Tokenized Vault: A project designed to tokenize real-world assets using the NEAR Protocol, highlighting our commitment to innovative blockchain solutions.\\\\n> Contribute to NEAR Ecosystem: I plan to actively participate in the hackathon and contribute through this project while learning from the community.\\\\n> Expand Service Offerings: By building on NEAR, I intend to explore and address increasing client demand for solutions beyond Ethereum.\\\\n\\\\n**Estimated Expenses:**\\\\nFlight Tickets (Mumbai, India \\\\u{2192} Bangkok, Thailand): $450\\\\nTotal Expenses Requested: **$450**\\\\nI am only requesting support for flights. All other expenses, including local transport, food, and miscellaneous costs, will be covered by me.\\\\n\\\\n**Why I Am an Ideal Candidate for the Travel Grant:**\\\\nAs the co-founder of Unblock Technolabs, I bring a wealth of experience in blockchain development. Having served more than 50 clients and being recognized as a leading web3 startup in India, I am eager to contribute to and grow within the NEAR ecosystem. I have received numerous client queries about NEAR-based solutions, and this hackathon presents an excellent opportunity to expand our expertise and demonstrate our commitment to the ecosystem. The NEAR RWA Tokenized Vault project I am bringing to the event aligns perfectly with NEAR\\\\\\'s goals, and my active participation will contribute meaningfully to the community.", "linked_proposals": [93], "receiver_account": "020866462aea47dd2a8ffb7b36bf782917bf091de9e03bae867fe4e4f95de3fa", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "450", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "labels": ["Hackathon", "Travel expenses"], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 130940322}

This project aims to tokenize real-world assets using the NEAR Protocol, demonstrating both technical expertise and innovative use cases.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/events-committee.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=98)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

The NEAR RWA Tokenized Vault project I am bringing to the event aligns perfectly with NEAR\\\\\\'s goals, and my active participation will contribute meaningfully to the community.", "linked_proposals": [93], "receiver_account": "020866462aea47dd2a8ffb7b36bf782917bf091de9e03bae867fe4e4f95de3fa", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "450", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDT"}, "author_id": "020866462aea47dd2a8ffb7b36bf782917bf091de9e03bae867fe4e4f95de3fa", "snapshot_history": [], "social_db_post_block_height": "0"}}

{"body": {"name": "Travel Stipend [REDACTED] Movement - Bangkok, Nov. 2024", "summary": "Hi, I\\\\\\'m Ahnaf, a full-stack developer with >4 years of experience. I have been in the NEAR ecosystem since 2020. I was one of the early engineers at Paras. Since then, I have been involved in various projects across the NEAR ecosystem, such as the NEAR wallet selector, NFT standards, Paras token, Paras NFT marketplace, and many more. I also have hands-on experience with NEAR\\\\\\'s latest technologies such as zero balance account, signed delegate, chain abstraction, and NEAR AI initiatives.", "category": "Bounty", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": null, "description": "Over the past year, I have been actively contributing to the NEAR ecosystem through various projects. Notably, I participated in metabuild Hackathon, where my team and I received [honorable mention](https://devpost.com/software/geovox) for our project. This recognition has further motivated me to continue contributing within the ecosystem. In addition, I also joined various hackathons in other blockchain projects, which deepened my knowledge of other blockchain technologies as well.\\\\n\\\\nFor this year\\\\u{2019}s Hackathon, my team and I are developing an AI tool designed to assist developers working within the NEAR ecosystem. We believe this tool will greatly enhance the developer experience by automating and optimizing common workflows.\\\\n\\\\nAttending this Hackathon will not only allow me to present our AI tool but also to further collaborate and contribute to the ecosystem. I am confident that the support provided will make a meaningful impact on my ability to participate and represent our community.\\\\n\\\\n**Travel cost**\\\\nI am writing to request a travel stipend to support my participation in the upcoming Redacted event in Thailand this November. The stipend will primarily cover my flight, accommodation, and expenses during the trip. Below are the detail of the costs:\\\\n- Flight (Jakarta to Bangkok and Bangkok to Jakarta) ~$200\\\\n- Hotel for 3 nights ~$200\\\\n- Other travel expense (meal, ticket, local transport, etc) ~$100\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n**Links**\\\\nHere is the link to my link portfolio showcasing my contributions and top projects:\\\\nGithub: https://github.com/ahnafalfariza/\\\\nDevpost: https://devpost.com/ahnafalfariza\\\\n\\\\nSome of my top projects within the ecosystem include\\\\n1. Geovox (geovox.xyz)\\\\n2. Paras product (one of early dApps on NEAR)\\\\n3. NEAR dev tools\\\\n4. NEAR decentralized component", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "ahnaf.near", "requested_sponsor": "events-committee.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "500", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": [], "accepted_terms_and_conditions_version": 130942398}

{"data": {"events-committee.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"We have just received a new *Bounty* proposal.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**By**: @ahnaf.near\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Title**: \\\\u{201c}Travel Stipend [REDACTED] Movement - Bangkok, Nov. 2024\\\\u{201c}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n**Summary**:\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nHi, I\\\\\\'m Ahnaf, a full-stack developer with >4 years of experience. I have been in the NEAR ecosystem since 2020. I was one of the early engineers at Paras. Since then, I have been involved in various projects across the NEAR ecosystem, such as the NEAR wallet selector, NFT standards, Paras token, Paras NFT marketplace, and many more. I also have hands-on experience with NEAR\\\\\\'s latest technologies such as zero balance account, signed delegate, chain abstraction, and NEAR AI initiatives.\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\n\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\u{2014}\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nRead the full proposal and share your feedback on [DevHub](/events-committee.near/widget/app?page=proposal&id=99)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}
